rubric_items.passed_description: App is written solely in the Java Programming Language
rubric_items.criteria: App is written solely in the Java Programming Language

rubric_items.passed_description: App conforms to common standards found in the [Android Nanodegree General Project Guidelines](http://udacity.github.io/android-nanodegree-guidelines/core.html) NOTE: It is okay if the app does not handle rotation properly or does not restore the data using `onSaveInstanceState`/`onRestoreInstanceState`)
rubric_items.criteria: App conforms to common standards found in the [Android Nanodegree General Project Guidelines](http://udacity.github.io/android-nanodegree-guidelines/core.html) NOTE: It is okay if the app does not handle rotation properly or does not restore the data using `onSaveInstanceState`/`onRestoreInstanceState`)

rubric_items.passed_description: App utilizes stable release versions of all libraries, Gradle, and Android Studio.
rubric_items.criteria: Submission must use stable release versions of all libraries, Gradle, and Android Studio. Debug/beta/canary versions are not acceptable.

rubric_items.passed_description: JSON data is parsed correctly to a Sandwich object in JsonUtils
rubric_items.criteria: JSON data is parsed correctly to a Sandwich object in JsonUtils

rubric_items.passed_description: JSON is parsed without using 3rd party libraries
rubric_items.criteria: JSON is parsed without using 3rd party libraries

rubric_items.passed_description: DetailActivity shows all Sandwich details correctly
rubric_items.criteria: DetailActivity shows all Sandwich details correctly

rubric_items.passed_description: Detail layout includes a ScrollView so all the details are visible in small screen devices
rubric_items.criteria: Detail layout includes a ScrollView so all the details are visible in small screen devices

rubric_items.passed_description: Sandwich details are shown in a sensible layout. For example, ingredients appear next to the ingredients label
rubric_items.criteria: Sandwich details are shown in a sensible layout. For example, ingredients appear next to the ingredients label
